choiceOption.name: lptmr_psr_prescaler
choiceOption.toolTip: Configures the size of the Prescaler in Time Counter mode or\n width of the glitch filter in Pulse Counter mode

binaryOption.name: lptmr_psr_pbyp
binaryOption.toolTip:
When PBYP is set:
 - The selected prescaler clock in Time Counter mode or
 the selected input source in Pulse Counter mode, directly clocks the CNR.
 When PBYP is clear:
 - The CNR is clocked by the output of the prescaler/glitch filter

choiceOption.name: lptmr_csr_tps
choiceOption.toolTip: Configures the input source to be used in Pulse Counter mode.\n The input connections vary by device

binaryOption.name: lptmr_csr_tms
binaryOption.toolTip: Configures the mode of the LPTMR

binaryOption.name: lptmr_csr_tfc
binaryOption.toolTip: When clear, TFC configures the CNR to reset whenever TCF is set.\n When set, TFC configures the CNR to reset on overflow

choice.name: CNR is reset whenever TCF is set

binaryOption.name: lptmr_csr_tpp
binaryOption.toolTip: Configures the polarity of the input source in Pulse Counter mode
